description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 8-Bit Defense pits you against some of the galaxies nastiest aliens as they try to make claim and take over your home town.
description.short: 8-Bit Defense pits you against some of the galaxies nastiest aliens as they try to make claim and take over your home town.
